label: YRM276
description: Assure Lock for Andersen Patio Doors

metadata.inclusion:
1. Enter the 4-8 digit master PIN code followed by the gear key
2. Press the 7 key followed by the gear key
3. Press the 1 key followed by the gear key
metadata.exclusion:
1. Enter the 4-8 digit master PIN code followed by the gear key
2. Press the 7 key followed by the gear key
3. Press the 3 key followed by the gear key
metadata.reset:
1. Remove the battery cover and batteries
2. Remove the interior lock to access the reset button above the cable connectors on the PCB
3. Re-insert 3 batteries and hold the reset button for 3 seconds
4. While still holding the reset button, insert the 4th battery and hold for an additional 3 seconds
5. Release the reset button and re-install the interior lock onto the door
